Sentencas: Existence of impurities in the product gas hinders the application of the system which combines gasification with solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment

Sentencas: A new method is proposed to produce qualified syngas, which integrates the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit (SWU).
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment

Sentencas: The SWU contains supercritical water mixer, separator, reactor (SWR) and expander.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment

Sentencas: To analyze performance of the proposed process from a systematic perspective, downstream operating units primarily including SOFC, burner, heat recovery steam generation and steam cycle are designed.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment

Sentencas: Model for the whole system is developed by using Aspen Plus and a mathematical model for the SOFC.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment

Sentencas: Sensitivity analysis regarding the fuel utilization factor (U-f) and the mass ratio of tars to supercritical water (T/W) are conducted in terms of system electrical efficiency, SOFC electrical efficiency and cell voltage.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment

Sentencas: Results show that combustible components in the obtained syngas mainly contain CH4, H-2, and CO. Tars are completely decomposed and only slight amount of light hydrocarbons (except CH4) are present.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment

Sentencas: One SWR can undertake the functions of water gas shift, tar reforming and methane synthesis concurrently.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment

Sentencas: The integrated process can offer a combustible components efficiency of 78.2%, and the system electrical efficiency is predicted to be 46.3%.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment

Sentencas: Uf has a significant influence on the SOFC electrical efficiency, while it has slight influence on system electrical efficiency.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment

Sentencas: As the T/W rises from 1.6% to 2%, system electrical efficiency, SOFC electrical efficiency and cell voltage slightly increase.
Titulo: An innovative system by integrating the gasification unit with the supercritical water unit to produce clean syngas for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): System performance assessment
